identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Dark Control Room' aesthetic that feels like a high-end developer tool, not a generic SaaS.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Cyberpunk aesthetics with Swiss Grid precision.
Content is King: Data is the hero. Code is the art.
Zoom In: Focus on the code diffs and risk metrics.
Negative Space: Use black space to make neon accents pop.
Contrast: High contrast text for readability in dark mode.

rules: Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds, use #050505.
Use Neon Mint (#00E599) sparingly for primary actions and success states.
Use Danger Red (#FF4D4D) for high-risk bugs.
Borders should be subtle (#27272A) unless active/focused.

grids.landing: Tetris Grid: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-8. Mix col-span-4, col-span-8, and col-span-full.
grids.dashboard: Control Room Grid: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4. Dense, minimal gaps.

buttons.primary: bg-[#00E599] text-black hover:bg-[#00CC88] rounded-sm font-bold tracking-tight shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(0,229,153,0.3)] transition-all hover:shadow-[0_0_25px_rgba(0,229,153,0.5)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#27272A] text-[#EDEDED] hover:border-[#EDEDED] rounded-sm transition-colors

cards.style: bg-[#0A0A0A] border border-[#27272A] rounded-sm p-6 hover:border-[#3F3F46] transition-colors

inputs.style: bg-[#050505] border border-[#27272A] focus:border-[#00E599] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#00E599] rounded-sm text-[#EDEDED] placeholder:text-[#52525B]

navigation.style: Fixed top, glassmorphism (bg-black/60 backdrop-blur-md), border-b border-white/5

visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise texture overlay (opacity 0.03) to the entire app to reduce digital flatness.
effects: Tracing Beam: Animate a gradient border around key cards on hover.
Scanlines: Optional subtle CRT scanline effect on code blocks.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React (default). Use thin strokes (1.5px) to match the technical vibe.

motion.loading: Use a 'terminal cursor' blinking effect or a minimalist progress bar. No spinning circles.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is #EDEDED on dark backgrounds. Use #A1A1AA for secondary text, never darker.
accessibility.testing: All interactive elements must have data-testid attribute.

hero_background.description: Futuristic city/data center with neon lights. Use as a darkened background for the Hero section with an overlay.

feature_structure.description: Concrete pathway with light. Use for 'Architecture/Structure' feature section.

developer_focus.description: Clean developer setup with code on screen. Use for 'Developer Experience' section.

team_collaboration.description: Dual monitors with code. Use for 'Team/Collaboration' section.

partner_bg.description: Minimalist white cards. Use as a background or texture for the 'Partners/Integrations' section.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Dark Control Room' theme. This is NOT a standard white SaaS.
Use the provided Google Fonts (Azeret Mono, Manrope, JetBrains Mono).
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Use the 'Tetris Grid' for the landing page and 'Control Room Grid' for the dashboard.
Use the provided image URLs for their respective sections.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds, only for subtle glows or borders.
Use Shadcn components but customize them to match the 'Dark Control Room' aesthetic (remove rounded-xl, use rounded-sm).
For charts, use Recharts with the custom palette (Primary: #00E599, Danger: #FF4D4D).
Create a 'design_system.css' or update 'index.css' with the new variables immediately.
